item.description: Dr. Matthew Raider, MD will speak. He is an informative, entertaining and amiable speaker. He strikes a comfortable balance between his medical training and scientific knowledge, and his many years of practicing meditation. Those in attendance were fascinated by his subject matter which he presented in a clear, organized and relaxed manner. His presentation is a mix of scientific and anecdotal evidence punctuated with humor and personal asides.
item.name: The Healing Power of Meditation
